verbs.description: Even before President Trump ’s announcement on Tuesday that the U.S. [V: would] be backing out of the Iran nuclear deal , the press had begun mounting an anxious defense of the agreeent . It ’s no secret that the Obama - era treaty has been a foreign policy favorite among many in the media , and the same was true back when it was first negotiated in 2015 .
